category.name: Active Workspace Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AW_TypeAheadFacetSearch_Delay
preference.preference_description: Defines the delay in type-ahead facet search (in millseconds). The type-ahead facet search will be delayed by the specified milliseconds. This is to reduce the performance issue caused by otherwise frequent search and rendering of the facets. Any invalid values (including zero or negative), will cause the value set to 500 milliseconds. The default value is 500 millseconds.
